column1: Uchi////If you are thinking of going here
column3: just go. This is the experience you are waiting for. Uchi shouldn't even be in the category with sushi. There is sushi
column5: and it is worth every penny you will spend. Stop waiting and just go. We have been to Uchi and Uchiko in Austin
column6: and the Houston location does an outstanding job. Be prepared to wait if you don't have a reservation
column7: two hours is average for a Saturday night
